frame.name: Rest
frame.definition:
<def-root>One <fen>Part</fen> of a larger <fen>Whole</fen> has been mentioned, is inferrable, or is available in the discourse setting and the previously unmentioned part, the <fen>Rest</fen>, is now mentioned.
<ex>The lenses , like the <t><fex name="Rest">rest</fex></t> <fex name="Whole">of the exoskeleton</fex>, are made of calcite.</ex> <ex>They see social policy work as a natural <t>complement</t> <fex name="Part">to bureau work</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Part
FE.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Part</fen> of a larger <fen>Whole</fen> that has been mentioned in prior discourse or is available in the discourse setting.
<ex>the GP had stipulated counselling as a <t>complement</t> <fex name="Part">to medication</fex></ex></def-root>

FE.name: Rest
FE.definition:
<def-root>The previously unmentioned part of the <fen>Whole</fen>.
<ex>You should try to persuade the <t><fex name="Rest">rest</fex></t> of the family to do so whatever their personal opinions</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Whole
FE.definition: <def-root>The larger entitiy or group that is fully made up of the <fen>Part</fen> and the <fen>Rest</fen>.</def-root>
